ace_zero.xcombat module¶

Exports the result of an ace_zero simulation to xcombat output for 3D visualisation.

class ace_zero.xcombat.AircraftState[source]¶

Bases: object

State of a single aircraft at a given instance in simulation time.

update_state(t, x, y, z, psi, theta, phi, v, weight, fuel)[source]¶
class ace_zero.xcombat.Timeslice[source]¶

Bases: object

A timeslice consists of a list of aircraft states for the current simulation timestep.

class ace_zero.xcombat.XCombatRun[source]¶

Bases: object

A history of a single simulation run. Consists of a header followed by a sequence of timeslices.

create_history_file()[source]¶

Creates a history run file. The name of the file is automatically generated, and includes the date and time of generation. By default the run history files are generated in a folder called runs. If the folder doesn’t exist it is created.

generate_run_history()[source]¶

Generates a history file for xcombat visualisation.

update_history(state_histories)[source]¶

Converts the list of fighter state histories into the xcombat format.

update_traces(traces)[source]¶

Loads a list of aircraft traces into the XCombat run format.
